text: ya 'ayuha aladhin sddaqu allah warasulah waeamiluu bshreh la tas'aluu ean 'ashya' min 'umur aldiyn lm twmru fiha bshy', kalswal ean al'umur ghyr alwaqet, 'aw alty yataratab ealayha tshdydat fi alshre, walaw kulliftmwha lshqqat elykm, wa'iin tas'aluu eanha fi hayat rasul allah salaa allah ealayh wasalam wahin nuzul alquran ealayh tubyan lkm, waqad tukllafwnha ftejzwn enha, tarakaha allah meafyana lieibadih mnha. wallah ghafur lieibadih 'iidha tabu, halim ealayhim fala yeaqbhm waqad anabu 'ilyh
